      • loadMailbox

        public Mailbox<Integer> loadMailbox(MailboxSession session,
                           File root,
                           String namespace,
                           String user,
                           String folderName)
                             throws MailboxException
        Creates a Mailbox object with data loaded from the file system
        Parameters:
        root - The main maildir folder containing the mailbox to load
        namespace - The namespace to use
        user - The owner of this mailbox
        folderName - The name of the mailbox folder
        Returns:
        The Mailbox object populated with data from the file system
        Throws:
        MailboxException - If the mailbox folder doesn't exist or can't be read

      • loadMailbox

        Parameters:
        mailboxPath - The path of the mailbox
        Returns:
        The Mailbox object populated with data from the file system
        Throws:
        MailboxNotFoundException - If the mailbox folder doesn't exist
        MailboxException - If the mailbox folder can't be read

        Inserts the user name parts in the general maildir location String
        Parameters:
        user - The user to get the root for.
        Returns:
        The name of the folder which contains the specified user's mailbox

                           throws MailboxException
        The main maildir folder containing all mailboxes for one user
        Parameters:
        user - The user name of a mailbox
        Returns:
        A File object referencing the main maildir folder
        Throws:
        MailboxException - If the folder does not exist or is no directory

      • nextUid

        public long nextUid(MailboxSession session,
           Mailbox<Integer> mailbox)
             throws MailboxException
        Description copied from interface: UidProvider
        Return the next uid which can be used while append a Message to the Mailbox. Its important that the returned uid is higher then the last used and that the next call of this method does return a higher one
        Specified by:
        nextUid in interface UidProvider<Integer>
        Returns:
        nextUid
        Throws:
        MailboxException
        See Also:
        UidProvider.nextUid(org.apache.james.mailbox.MailboxSession, org.apache.james.mailbox.store.mail.model.Mailbox)

      • nextModSeq

        public long nextModSeq(MailboxSession session,
              Mailbox<Integer> mailbox)
                throws MailboxException
        Description copied from interface: ModSeqProvider
        Return the next mod-sequence which can be used for the Mailbox. Its important that the returned mod-sequence is higher then the last used and that the next call of this method does return a higher one. The first mod-seq must be >= 1
        Specified by:
        nextModSeq in interface ModSeqProvider<Integer>
        Returns:
        modSeq
        Throws:
        MailboxException
